description: Get Service Group(s) from the device
name: get_service_groups

device_group.description: If interacting with a Panorama, the device group to add the object to. Will default to Shared if using Panorama

name.description: Name of the object. When not passed, all objects of this type will be returned.

serialize.description: When true, the return object(s) will be json serialized. When false, the action will return the raw pandevice python object(s).
